articles.title: Reliance doubles down on 5G pledge after record profit - ETTelecom.com
articles.description: Indian billionaire Mukesh Ambani doubled down on his promise to offer 5G services on his wireless network as early as this year, as his conglomerate Reliance Industries Ltd. reported a record profit aided by its consumer businesses.
